comment: Professor Butun is a great professor. her online Summer Psych 101 class was fast paced, but she was clear about deadlines and used a very convenient system to ensure the material was taught in the short time-window. Would love to take a class with her in person that allows more time

Professor Butun is the absolute kindest, sweetest professor I have ever taken. Her class is extremely easy yes, however, it is so informative. Anything I could tell you is already in her syllabus, you honestly do not have to email her for anything because of how descriptive her syllabus is, and she is so down to earth.

This is my second time taking her. She is really good at her job! This is class is hard though because of the content, not her. The project is not horrible though, it is the weekly writings that were difficult. One semester long project, weekly 2 page papers, weekly quizzes that are 25-30 questions, and weekly discussion posts with 3 replies.

Professor Butun is incredibly kind and her workload is very reasonable for the course. The timespan given for each chapter is very reasonable and flexible, and the content itself is very interesting. She also does weekly extra credit through optional discussion posts. I would definitely take her again!

I took this class in the spring, and initially, I felt overwhelmed due to all the assignments due in a week and all the readings. However, Dr. Butun made this class super easy. As long as you do her assignments, discussions, and watch her midterm/final review video you will Ace this class.

Very organized, but I am not fond of the platform she uses for assignments. Discussion post with 3 responses are due on Tuesday's. Chapter homework (usually includes 20+ activities inside) are also due on Tuesday's. 2 tests and a long project that is worth 15% of your grade.

I loved Dr. Butun, as she was very caring of all her students and provided amazing feedback on assignments. She has a heavy workload and it can be a lot but it ensures that you understand the lesson. She also provides lectures that are very informative! Tests were easy due to her lessons and study materials!
Easy A
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: She is honestly the best professor I've had online. It is clear what exactly she is expected to do, and I like how she is organized. Although it can be a lot, it's honestly super easy as long as you take notes. The class as a whole is interesting to learn and can actually be helpful in life.

This course covers a lot of material, but the subject is so interesting, and Professor Butun's lectures were really helpful to understanding the content! We had written responses for each chapter, but they helped us really retain the information to do well in the course. I would definitely recommend this course and would take her courses again.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--EXTRA CREDIT--Amazing lectures

comment: I had her online and she was awesome. She went over the powerpoint in her lectures and explained it so well. She gave great feedback for everything. She even allows you to use an entire page of notes front and back for the midterm and final as well as posting a review video with a study guide. Great professor! Definitely recommend.

Dr. Butun is a great professor! She cares for her students and gives them plenty of resources to learn and understand. She gives study guides before the midterm and final. She practically gives all of the answers to the exams. This is beneficial because you are allowed one page of notes front and back. A lot of work, but a good class.

Kim Butun is such a good online professor that I'm registering to take her again for cognitive psych next semester. She makes her grading criteria really clear and uses the achieve program but communicates really well with the class throughout the semester on due dates. Homework is due every tuesday. totally chill
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Accessible outside class--Online Savvy

comment: I was signed up for this class because of the review on RMP. But this is the worst class that I have done ever. There are LOT of works every week. We only have two exam, which include LOCKDOWN & WEBCAM. I would never want to take this class again. Please think twice for signing up into this class!!!!!

All assignments were through Launchpad, nothing was graded by her. It's pretty much a self paced class because I took it online and she didn't really do anything. Just read the textbook and you should be fine.

Professor Butun is great! She obviously cares about her students, and the material wasn't difficult to learn. This was a summer 4-week course, so just know that there was literally something due every night! As long as you keep up with your work, it's not that hard to end with an A :)
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Lots of homework--Caring

comment: I took a 4-week online class. It was a lot of work, but the Prof did everything possible to help. She was available via email and zoom and responded fairly quickly. She's a wonderful Prof to take if you want to actually learn, not memorize. She provided wonderful reviews for each chapter, midterm, and final. Take her if you get the opportunity to!
I took the 4-week course. A lot of work but super easy! She cares for her students. It is impossible to get less than an A.

Professor Butun is amazing! She very clearly cares for her students and has clear grading criteria. She also gives extra credit discussions, and her assignments were easy. She allowed us to use a page of notes for the tests. Take her!

You know how they say you should devote, like, 10 hours a week to each college course but no one ever does? You will need to for this class. The work isn't really hard, but it takes forever. Review videos are 1-2 hours long for example. Love Prof. Butun though; very caring and made me feel good about myself :)
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Gives good feedback--Lots of homework

comment: Most of the work is on Launch Pad very straight forward and easy for the most part. She gives good feedback and responds to emails same day. Took her online and she is accessible through zoom every Tuesday. Work was great just time consuming.

This course is a lot of work but if you organize your schedule it'll be okay. It is a lot of textbook based activities, and discussion posts. I would take this course again but definitely not a class for someone who does not want to put in a lot of work. There are also two big tests so it is one to pay attention to.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Lots of homework

comment: not a difficult class just very time consuming. all discussion are optional and are counted as extra credit. lots of launchpad assignments that are due on the same day. if you put the effort in youll pass the class.

not hard, just time consuming. but you have enough time to complete it all. you only get one extension on late work (however under certain circumstances that were out of your control she is generous). the quizzes was easy but you have 50 mins for 50 questions. the final is nothing like the quizzes so study and use the allowed cheat sheet.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Lots of homework--Clear grading criteria

comment: weekly assignments due at the same time/day every week! her chapter review videos are amazing ( as an asynch class) and she does great at answering any questions regarding class concepts. extra credit discussion posts for every chapter are available to help out with grades

Lots of work on Launchpad. Due at the same time and day every week. Make sure to do the work and youll pass. One big project that you have to write about but it was easy. Discussion posts are there for extra credit which is great. Just do the work and its an easy A!

the class was very simple and straightforward. read the textbook, take the chapter quiz. she let us use a page of notes during the quizzes as well. there's no homework so the activities in the online textbook and the quizzes were the only grades used. very easy
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria

comment: Professor Butun is a great professor. She cares very much for her students, but you have to put in the work. She does a video review for each quiz However you do need to read. She ensures that you are actually reading the material and learning.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Get ready to read
